interface.description: **Note:** The fields used in this interface, comes from the [DCMI Dublin Core Metadata Initiative](https://www.dublincore.org/).

field.name: Contributor
field.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

field.name: Coverage
field.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant.

field.name: Creator
field.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

field.name: Date
field.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

field.name: Format
field.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.

field.name: Identifier
field.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

field.name: Publisher
field.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available.

field.name: Rights
field.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

field.name: Source
field.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

field.name: Title
field.description: A name given to the resource.

field.name: Type
field.description: The nature or genre of the resource.
